csw:Record.dct:abstract: This dataset provides all time series, each one matching a IAGOS flight. The dataset includes values of all species measured by IAGOS instrumentation with a time acquisition resolution of 4 seconds as well as meteorological fields provided by the aircraft or the ECMWF.
csw:Record.dc:description: This dataset provides all time series, each one matching a IAGOS flight. The dataset includes values of all species measured by IAGOS instrumentation with a time acquisition resolution of 4 seconds as well as meteorological fields provided by the aircraft or the ECMWF.
csw:Record.dc:source: Data produced by the European Research Infrastructure IAGOS.
